text: Hima hih ko thona abi chu mulungrîl hâinân an hong sipa, male lungkhamnân munkhatin an inchunna, riettheina adikin an dôn ngâi rietminthârna akipdir an dôn theina rangin ani. Ma anghan Pathien chonginthup hah hong riet an ta, ma Khrista nanâk hah ani.2:2: Pathien chonginthup, maha Khrista nanâk hah ania; miziek senkhat ngeia chu Pathien chonginthup; adangngeiin Pathien chonginthup Khrista Pa; adang nôkchu Pathien le Pa, male Khrista chonginthup: tiin an dôn ani.
